<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/f877983c4f5dc185bb3b4a0e8611b711/tumblr_inline_nit7lx3Nh21rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><iframe frameborder="0" height="236" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/jcEt9ZWE3c8" width="420"></iframe></p>

<p>If you’re in the mood for a little fun, <strong>Veyda92</strong>'s <a href="http://bit.ly/1zlsQ2n"><strong>PUNTJEB</strong></a> combines the thrill of tossing Kerbals around with a functional stat system. It measures the velocity of your punts, the last punt you made, the longest punt you made and much more!</p>

<p>Get more info on <strong>PuntJeb</strong> <a href="http://bit.ly/1zlsQ2n"><strong>HERE</strong></a>.</p>
I saw this on CKAN, looks pretty cool, going to try it. So it's business as usual?
Sweet. I can see Danny using this in the future for "science"
Why would Squad choose to feature a mod that's over a year old and listed as being for version 0.23?

Why would Squad choose to feature a mod that's over a year old and listed as being for version 0.23?

It was last updated on the 20th, I'm guessing the author forgot to update the version its compatible with.

It was last updated on the 20th, I'm guessing the author forgot to update the version its compatible with.

Awesome, I've always wanted to be rewarded for the senseless deaths I cause daily
Kerbal Space Program is now an iPhone game.
